name: CALAMITY -DISASTER SIM
description:
Description

You wake up and have no memory of yourself. When you wake up, you meet a strange robot that "helps" you to live your life. But not only do you forget your memory, many disasters suddenly befall you consecutively.

Save yourself and find the reason for your memory loss!

Controls
  • Move - [WASD]
  • Interact - [E]
  • Pickup Items - [F]
Credits
  • Roger Julianto Angryawan (Team Manager, Game Designer, Game Programmer)
  • Nyra Puji Astuty (Game Designer)
  • Danny Kurnia Setiawan (Game Artist 3D, Game Designer)
  • Jesceline Novenia (Game Artist 2D)
  • Reynaldy Sentosa (Game Programmer)
  • Lauretta Gail Rosalind Wijaya (Sound Engineer)
  • Steven Yoshell Yapriadi (Project Supervisor)
